content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

In-person attendance of students in practical education is not possible at the moment.

The only exception being schools with medical specializations and social service specializations and this applies to all grades of education (vocational schools, secondary schools, universities, and vocational colleges).

The exceptions apply also to students of the pedagogical field. They can help with schooling.Â
